rz_favorite_neighborhood::intro_card_0::: What's your favorite part of your neighborhood?
rz_favorite_neighborhood::text_card_2::t: Please follow the instructions below. Once you're done, select 'Publish' to upload your photos to us.
rz_favorite_neighborhood::text_card_0::t: Radio Zamaneh is collecting photos of the unique neighborhoods our readers live in.
rz_favorite_neighborhood::clip_card_0::g: Photograph a place that makes you proud to live in your neighborhood.
rz_favorite_neighborhood::text_card_3::t: Focus on aspects that are unique to the place.
rz_favorite_neighborhood::text_card_1::t: We want to see what you love about where you live and what happens there.
rz_favorite_neighborhood::clip_card_1::g: Photograph a neighbor doing something unique to your neighborhood.
rz_favorite_neighborhood::title: What's your favorite part of your neighborhood?
rz_favorite_neighborhood::text_card_4::t: Now select 'Publish' and your photos will be sent to Radio Zamaneh.
